participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Practical and down-to-earth, with a strong focus on hobbies that bring joy.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Chris
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and creative, with a passion for storytelling and a love for the unconventional.
participant_2.background: i'm a stay at home dad. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites.

content.text: i do not have pets   i just have the desire to become a fashion designer
